text: You decide to try the boat. You paddle out into the middle of the lake, hot sun beating down on you, when suddenly the boat begins to fill with water. You frantically try to empty the boat of water but it's hopeless. Soon you're floating in the water, freezing, when suddenly you feel a tug at your leg. You're pulled into the water, and despite your thrashing, you can't escape. Slowly all turns to darkness around you.
